> If you have any ideas on how to balance [Limited skin redistribution], we’re listening.

I think it's important that these skins be seen not as rare items per se, but in terms of why they were created. Why are they rare? As long as these skins are obtained in a way similar to their original release, I think players could feel comfortable about it. I think I have some reasonable solutions below. They can also be integrated into the Hextech Crafting system by having the events _unlock a chance to open/reroll_ that item, rather than straight up unlocking that item itself.

**Giveaway Skins** were created as _event-specific skins_. They function as a marker of _participation_ in an event. The solution here seems reasonably straightforward - recreate that event.

Using _PAX skins_ as example, redistribute again at future PAX events. Instead of creating individual codes for each champion, you could also create a single random-chance code which gives attendants a random PAX skin.

_King Rammus_ was for Closed Beta players, but could also be for players who have provided a lot of significant testing feedback or community contribution over an extended period of time.

**Achievement Skins** are similar to Giveaway Skins as a mark of participation, but with added significance as a marker of _demonstrated skill_. These have a similar possibile solution - create a new opportunity to demonstrate that skill, possibly with a higher threshold.

The _Season Reward Skins_ for example could be re-used for future season rewards, restricting to the uppermost tiers as an additional bonus. Such an implementation seems fair to me - get Gold for the corresponding season (relatively easy) or work harder in a later season to reach a higher rank if you missed the first chance.

**Previously Sold Skins** are a bit trickier, because they were intentionally created to be limited edition items with a _small time window_ for purchasing. But I think there's a reasonable solution using the Hextech Crafting system. Periodically, allow the _Reroll into Permanent Skin_ option to output a Limited Skin _coupon_, giving players the option to purchase that skin for RP.
